dcterms:description: MS MARCO is a large-scale dataset aggregated from anonymized Bing search queries containing > 8M passages from diverse text sources. Within MS MARCO, we focus on the passage re-ranking task, which gives a query and a set of relevant documents, retrieved using some rudimentary algorithm. The goal is to re-rank this set of documents to enhance the relevance of the top results for a given query. The average length of a passage in the MS MARCO dataset is 1131 words.
dcterms:title: MS Marco
